name: Caribbean Research and Management of Biodiversity
goal: All departments (education, consultancy, research and park management) of CARMABI have their own mission and vision statement, but the overall vision of our organization is to be the leading organization in the Caribbean on applied natural sciences by means of knowledge acquisition, knowledge dispersal and nature management applications.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: UNESCO World Heritage Site, SIDS programs, Horizon 2020, Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean, EDF, BEST program
